rules_text:
Invasive Kelp must be blocked if able.
{2}{G}, Exile Invasive Kelp from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or Vehicle you control. It must be blocked this turn if able. Activate only as a sorcery.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
